verses.text: By the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, there we sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w*, yea, we \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, when we \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.
We \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* our \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* upon the \w willows|strong="H6155"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof.

For there they that carried us away \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* \w required|strong="H7592"\w* of us a \w song|strong="H1697"\w*; and they that \w wasted|strong="H8437"\w* us \add required of us\add* \w mirth|strong="H8057"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* us \add one\add* of the \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.\f + \fr 137.3 \ft a song: Heb. the words of a song\f*\f + \fr 137.3 \ft wasted…: Heb. laid us on heaps\f*

How shall we \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* in a \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*?\f + \fr 137.4 \ft strange…: Heb. land of a stranger?\f*
If I \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thee, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, let my right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \add her cunning\add*.

If I do not \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thee, let my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* to the roof of my \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w*; if I \w prefer|strong="H5927"\w* not \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* above my \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*.\f + \fr 137.6 \ft my chief…: Heb. the head of my joy\f*

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; who \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Rase|strong="H6168"\w* \add it\add*, \w rase|strong="H6168"\w* \add it, even\add* to the \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 137.7 \ft Rase it: Heb. Make bare\f*

O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, who art to be \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w*; \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add shall he be\add*, that \w rewardeth|strong="H7999"\w* thee as thou hast \w served|strong="H1580"\w* us.\f + \fr 137.8 \ft destroyed: Heb. wasted\f*\f + \fr 137.8 \ft rewardeth…: Heb. recompenseth unto thee thy deed which thou didst to us\f*

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add shall he be\add*, that \w taketh|strong="H0270"\w* and \w dasheth|strong="H5310"\w* thy little \w ones|strong="H5768"\w* against the \w stones|strong="H5553"\w*.\f + \fr 137.9 \ft the stones: Heb. the rock\f*
